    • Method Detail

      • getColumnTypes

        protected java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getColumnTypes​(CashFlowReport report)
        Description copied from class: ReportFormatter
        Gets the type of the data in each report column.

        If every value in a column is a failure the type will be Object.class.

        Specified by:
        getColumnTypes in class ReportFormatter<CashFlowReport>
        Parameters:
        report - the report
        Returns:
        a list of column types
